title: THE BEST OF THE DAN PATRICK SHOW
itunes:title: THE BEST OF THE DAN PATRICK SHOW
description:
On the Friday edition of The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show:  With Doug and TJ filling in for Dan.  They discuss the Baker Mayfield trade to the Panthers, the timing of it, and how Baker fits into that offense.

Doug and TJ discuss the likelihood of the Lakers trading for Kyrie Irving and if Russell Westbrook is enough to get it done.  

NFL Network Reporter/Insider Mike Garafolo joins TJ and Doug to talk about the Baker Mayfield deal, what happens with Jimmy Garappollo in San Francisco, and all of the other main NFL Headlines this week.

#DougGottliebShow   #UpOnGame 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
